price: 6 Vous en admirez la beauté quand, le soir, vous les ramenez au bercail et lorsque, le matin, vous les menez au pâturage.
arabic: وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا جَمَالٌ حِينَ تُرِيحُونَ وَحِينَ تَسۡرَحُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walakum fīhā jamālun ḥīna turīḥūna waḥīna tasraḥūna
